info.name: Company & Owner Management API
info.description:
Complete API collection for Real Estate Company & Owner Management System (Feature 007)

## Overview
- Manage Real Estate Companies (Imobiliárias)
- Manage Company Owners
- Multi-tenancy with company isolation
- Self-registration for new owners

## Authentication
All requests require:
- `Authorization: Bearer {{jwt_token}}` (OAuth 2.0 JWT)
- Some endpoints also require `Cookie: session_id={{session_id}}` (marked in request)

## Architecture
- Owner API is **independent** (not nested under Company)
- Owner can be created WITHOUT a company
- Owner is linked to companies via separate endpoint

## Variables
Configure these in your Postman environment:
- `base_url`: http://localhost:8069
- `jwt_token`: OAuth token from authentication
- `session_id`: Session ID (required for some endpoints)
- `company_id`: Company ID for operations
- `owner_id`: Owner ID for detail operations

request.description:
Create a new Owner without company association (self-registration).

Decorators: @require_jwt
RBAC: Any authenticated app can create owners

Required fields:
- name: Owner's full name
- email: Valid email (unique)
- password: Secure password (min 8 chars)

Optional fields:
- phone: Contact phone
- mobile: Mobile phone

Response: 201 with owner details and HATEOAS links

Retrieve specific owner details by ID.

Decorators: @require_jwt, @require_session
RBAC: Owner can see their own data, Admin can see all

Response includes:
- Owner details
- Linked companies
- Company count
- HATEOAS links

Update owner profile information.

Decorators: @require_jwt, @require_session
RBAC: Owner can update their own data, Admin can update all

Updatable fields:
- name
- phone
- mobile

NOTE: Email and password changes use separate endpoints

Soft delete an owner (deactivate).

Decorators: @require_jwt, @require_session
RBAC: Admin only

Validation:
- Cannot delete if owner is the last owner of any company

Response: 200 with success message

request.description:
Link an existing owner to a company.

Decorators: @require_jwt, @require_session, @require_company
RBAC: Admin or existing Owner of the company

Use case: Add co-owner to existing company

Response: 200 with success message

Unlink owner from a company.

Decorators: @require_jwt, @require_session, @require_company
RBAC: Admin only

Validation:
- Cannot unlink if owner is the last owner of the company

Response: 200 with success message

request.description:
List all companies the user has access to.

Decorators: @require_jwt, @require_session, @require_company
RBAC: Returns only companies in user's estate_company_ids

Query parameters:
- limit: Page size (default 20, max 100)
- offset: Page offset (default 0)
- active: Filter by status (default true)
- search: Search by name or CNPJ

Response includes pagination metadata and HATEOAS links

request.description:
Create a new Real Estate Company.

Decorators: @require_jwt, @require_session, @require_company
RBAC: Owner or Admin

Required fields:
- name: Company trade name
- legal_name: Legal company name
- cnpj: Valid Brazilian CNPJ (format: XX.XXX.XXX/XXXX-XX)
- email: Valid email

Optional fields:
- creci: Real estate license
- phone, mobile: Contact numbers
- website: Company website
- Address fields (street, city, state_id, zip_code)
- description: Company description

Validation:
- CNPJ format and check digits validated
- CNPJ uniqueness enforced
- Email format validated
- Creator automatically linked as owner

Response: 201 with company details and HATEOAS links

Retrieve specific company details by ID.

Decorators: @require_jwt, @require_session, @require_company
RBAC: User must have access to this company

Response includes:
- Company details
- Address information
- Contact information
- HATEOAS links

Update company information.

Decorators: @require_jwt, @require_session, @require_company
RBAC: Owner of the company or Admin

Updatable fields:
- Contact info (phone, mobile, email, website)
- Address fields
- Description

NOTE: CNPJ and legal_name cannot be changed after creation

Soft delete a company (deactivate).

Decorators: @require_jwt, @require_session, @require_company
RBAC: Admin only

Effect:
- Company active = False
- Company no longer appears in listings
- Related data preserved (soft delete)

Response: 200 with success message
